content: I wanted to call #92616 to T-infra's collective attention. The first two times bors ran,dist-x86_64-msvc-alt never started, which would (I'm guessing, anyway) have caused CI to hit a timeout if it hadn't been manually halted. The first time someone attempted to halt it, it wouldn't respond to force commands. Eventually, they just closed the pull request and reopened it. The third bors run ended in a regular spurious network failure, which I would guess is unrelated.
I know bors can be flaky at times, but this is a bit much. I think something weird is going on, at least with the first two failures.
I don't think @bors force does anything outside buildbot
yeah
to restart a build it's @bors retry
also, the windows builders are fully managed by github (their hosted runners), so there's little control we have there if they don't start :(

Pietro Albini said:

to restart a build it's @bors retry

Even if it's still in progress? Interesting.
Is their documentation of bors commands beyond the cheatsheet on the website?

Pietro Albini said:

also, the windows builders are fully managed by github (their hosted runners), so there's little control we have there if they don't start :(

That is very unfortunate.
I'm sorry for comping here and complaining about things that y'all don't have control over.

inquisitivecrystal said:

I'm sorry for comping here and complaining about things that y'all don't have control over.

no worries!

inquisitivecrystal said:

Is their documentation of bors commands beyond the cheatsheet on the website?

not really, and tbh it should be updated to remove useless commands like force
I hope github's new merge queues will be good enough that we can retire bors
I think it would likely be helpful to have some, or have the cheatsheet expanded. For instance, I would not have guessed that retry is the relevant command here.
Not that it matters too much, given that I don't have privileges. It's always nice to understand though, and it seems to have tripped up someone else here too.
retried it, maybe the pr is just a bit cursed..:sweat_smile:
@inquisitivecrystal theres a list if bors cmds here: https://bors.rust-lang.org/ :smile:
Yep! That's the cheatsheet on the website I was referring to.
I honestly didn't think you'd still be awake at this point.
its lunch break time here :D
